llm.feedback: Adjust each line to (1) include a canonical handle (ust10y or dxy) in the driver/mechanism field, (2) add the magnitude range for the impact (e.g., “10‑15 bp” for ust10y or “50‑60 bp” for the 2‑yr/10‑yr spread), (3) keep the driver/mechanism and “What to watch” as single phrases, (4) attach the appropriate ID citations to the magnitude facts and catalysts, (5) ensure the line remains a single sentence, (6) keep the probability as a numeric % with no extra text, and (7) preserve the order of 2 Up and 2 Down. Remove any drift and keep the format exactly: Up/Down | Time window | Driver/Mechanism | What to watch | Probability %.
